mapper.sql: MARKET_NO marketNo, USER_ID userId, MARKET_TITLE marketTitle, MARKET_CONTENT marketContent, MARKET_DATE marketDate, MARKET_STATUS marketStatus, MARKET_PRICE marketPrice
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_MARKET WHERE MARKET_NO = #{marketNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MARKET SET MARKET_TITLE = #{marketTitle}, MARKET_CONTENT = #{marketContent}, MARKET_PRICE = #{marketPrice}, MARKET_STATUS = #{marketStatus}, MARKET_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MARKET_NO = #{marketNo}
mapper.select: SELECT M.MARKET_NO, M.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, M.MARKET_TITLE, M.MARKET_CONTENT, M.MARKET_DATE, M.MARKET_STATUS, M.MARKET_PRICE, , ( SELECT MI.MARKET_IMG_URL FROM TB_MARKET_IMG MI WHERE MI.MARKET_NO = M.MARKET_NO AND MI.IMG_ORDER = 1 FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) AS thumbnailUrl FROM TB_MARKET M JOIN TB_USER U ON M.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE M.IS_HIDDEN = 'N' ORDER BY M.MARKET_NO DESC

SELECT M.MARKET_NO AS marketNo, M.USER_ID AS userId, M.MARKET_TITLE AS marketTitle, M.MARKET_CONTENT AS marketContent, M.MARKET_DATE AS marketDate, M.MARKET_STATUS AS marketStatus, M.MARKET_PRICE AS marketPrice, U.USER_NAME AS userName,
FROM TB_MARKET M JOIN TB_USER U ON M.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE M.MARKET_NO = #{marketNo}
SELECT MARKET_IMG_ID AS marketImgId, MARKET_NO AS marketNo, MARKET_IMG_URL AS imgUrl, IMG_ORDER AS imgOrder FROM TB_MARKET_IMG WHERE MARKET_NO = #{marketNo} ORDER BY IMG_ORDER ASC
